text: Irving Grundman (July 23, 1928 â€“ February 26, 2021) was a Canadian ice hockey executive. He was general manager of the Montreal Canadiens from 1978 until 1983. He was born in Montreal. Grundman died on February 26, 2021 in Montreal at the age of 92. He suffered a short illness prior until his death. == References == Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Canadian businesspeople Category:Ice hockey people from Quebec Category:Sportspeople from Montreal Category:Stanley Cup champions Category:Disease-related deaths in Quebec
